content.description: Fun easy climbing leads to jugs under a small roof. Clip the chain, pull the bulge and work the cruxy face moves to a rest. Continue to the top on easier terrain.
content.location: The first route in the shallow cave just after Salad Bar with the obvious fixed chain 3rd bolt.

climbs.name: So a knee walked into a bar...

content.description: A few face moves lead to good holds under a small roof. A few powerful moves through the roof to a rest stance. Easier climbing to the chains.
content.location: 2nd route right of the obvious roof crack.

content.description: Don't get put off by the sandy start. Some awkward moves to gain a good ledge at the first bolt. Clip the bolt over the small roof and work the difficult sequence into a stance in the shallow dihedral. Continue on thin face moves to a decent rest, then cruise to the top.
content.location: 2nd route from the left in the Boneyard, easily identifiable as the first route right of the fixed chain down low on Wave Rider.

content.description: Climb the easy face to the roof, then start the pumpy moves to a mediocre rest. Trend right onto the redpoint crux face with thin holds and bad feet. A few fun moves to a rest ledge and easier terrain to the top.
content.location: Last route on right side of The Boneyard cave, takes the easiest line out of the small roof

content.description: This area has several steep sport climbs and a 5.11 trad roof crack.
